title: Dungeon Fray 0.8 (roguelike)
description:
This is: Dungeon Fray 0.8

A simple little game, but the strategy elements are there. If you dig roguelikes then check it out... pretty fun stuff!
--------------------------------------


Description:
Dungeon Fray is a fast paced roguelike/puzzle game. It features three playable classes, randomly generated levels, turn based combat and unlockable achievements and perks.

Key Features:
-Play as Fighter, Mage or Rogue
-Randomly generated levels, random monsters and random loot
-8 Levels in story mode plus 'Infinite Mode'
-9 different spells to aid you in combat
-Unlockable achievements and perks to enhance your character
-Perma-death
